text: Producer, what are you looking at?

Oh, this here.
It's a magazine featuring outfits from fashion shows.

It's quite informative.
I think staying on top of trends is part of the job.

Is that so...
Can I look at it with you?

Yeah, sure. But... um...
Are you looking for inspiration for your casual wear?

No, not that.
I thought it would be educational.

Stage outfits often tend to be unconventional, right?
Things you wouldn't wear in everyday life...

Haha, yeah, that's true.
Stage outfits often aim to make idols stand out.

Yeah, studying outfits
might lead to some inspiration───
